alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 3:50AM EST until February 28 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex. In Pennsylvania, Monroe. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact this evenings commute and also the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates should reach around an inch per hour tonight. The highest snowfall totals should be at locations above 1500 feet in elevation. Some sleet may also mix in at times for portions of the area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
